title: @Meddler remember how you said you were looking to give some buffs to Darius?
body:
How come the only change he got was to his ult? It was a good buff, I will admit, but that isn't enough to help him out in todays meta.

I'm not saying he is old Sion tier, but he isn't tier 1 or god tier, he's very situational as the only use he has is his laning phase, and if he loses his lane phase(which HAPPENS), he is useless all game as his teamfighting is mediocre at beast.

Is he getting anything else Meddler? He really needs some help.

If he isn't getting help because he is getting his rework again, that's fine.

replies.body: Upvoted, mate. Meddler tell us something about that

I personally think that the only thing darius really NEEDS is bug fixes, because he has a crazy amount of bugs that can legit lose you a game.

You got the bleed bug, where it doesn't do full damage.

The cursor bug, where some sequence of events (Have yet to figure it out tbh), will cause your cursor to glitch. This causes you to not be able to select targets to attack unless you use attack move, and you can no longer ping or use the minimap to move your camera.

The W bug in which his attack speed slow wasn't proccing (Is fixed for now. Apparently this bug will randomly appear. Did some digging, happened sometime last year too)

His ult sometimes not reseting on kill, when you very cleary killed them within a 0.5 second window of the ult landing. 

Shit like that.

Now, with the full reset at level 16, darius actually has a pretty solid lategame honestly. Especially in a tank meta, where more often than not someone on his team will have initiation. Darius is a lot easier to justify picking right now. Just fix his goddamn bugs.

Good. But not enough. He is still really bad when not overfed.
He wins his lane he is nearly unstoppable. Basically like an avalanche, one little lead and he can push it all the way to their nexus.
You could probably stop an avalanche. Not really worth it to do so but you could.

Aren't Riven, Irelia, Tryndamere, Renekton, Hecarim, and hell just about every top laner the same? 

He's more kiteable than those guys and loses to most ranged champs in lane and late game.

>Aren't Riven, Irelia, Tryndamere, Renekton, Hecarim, and hell just about every top laner the same?

They are (minus Hec) less extreme versions of Darius. They rely somewhat on early-mid game snowball to overcome certain match-ups, but none of them are as strong in those phases as Darius. in exchange these champs do scale a lot better than Darius though. Darius's trade of for his early game that destroys every other melee champ in the game is his lack of scaling.

Actually no. Darius is one of the few champions where while in his danger zone, you usually don't escape. He has so much stickiness, DOT, and burst that very few champions who are melee can stay in melee range with him and trade favorably/ live. Also Darius counters all of the champions you just mentioned. This is why I pick him. Even Tryndamere can't deal with him because he has the luxury of building tanky and reducing his attackspeed VIA w.
